DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine best way administer candidate HIV vaccine , ALVAC HIV-1 ( vCP205 ) .
DOC.brief_title: HIV Candidate Vaccine , ALVAC-HIV-1 , Administration HIV-Negative Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy adult volunteer assign randomly either vaccine placebo group . Injections receive either intramuscularly , intradermally , delivery skin volunteer 's white blood cell dendritic cell reinfusion . Volunteers vaccinate 0 , 1 , 3 , 6 month time point . Volunteers closely monitor 1 hour vaccination keep diary symptom 1 week post-immunization . Volunteers undergo leukopheresis start study last vaccination Walter Reed Army Medical Center . Volunteers receive compensation benefit .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Volunteers may eligible study : Are legal US resident . Are healthy adult 18 55 year age . Exclusion Criteria Volunteers eligible study : Are HIVpositive . Are high risk HIV infection . Are pregnant breastfeeding . Are allergic egg neomycin . Use certain prescription medication .
